tickets.title: Login button not responding
tickets.description: The login button on the homepage doesn’t work on mobile.

tickets.title: Email not verified issue
tickets.description: Users are not receiving verification emails.

tickets.title: Dashboard not loading
tickets.description: Dashboard takes too long to load after login.

tickets.title: Ticket deletion issue
tickets.description: Resolved tickets cannot be deleted.

tickets.title: Broken image link
tickets.description: Image thumbnails fail to load on ticket view.

tickets.title: Form validation bug
tickets.description: Form allows submission without required fields.

tickets.title: Image upload error
tickets.description: Large images fail to upload due to server timeout.

tickets.title: Payment integration issue
tickets.description: Stripe payments not updating order status.

tickets.title: Page not found error
tickets.description: Navigating to /profile throws 404 error.

tickets.title: Dark mode not saving
tickets.description: User preference for dark mode resets after refresh.

tickets.title: Notification delay
tickets.description: Push notifications are delayed by several minutes.

tickets.title: Forgot password not working
tickets.description: Reset link email not being sent to users.

tickets.title: Slow loading homepage
tickets.description: Homepage assets take too long to load.

tickets.title: Ticket search not accurate
tickets.description: Searching tickets returns unrelated results.

tickets.title: App crash on logout
tickets.description: App sometimes crashes after user logs out.

tickets.title: User stats incorrect
tickets.description: Analytics dashboard shows wrong data count.

tickets.title: Ticket comment duplication pppp
tickets.description: Comments get duplicated after page reload.

tickets.title: Sidebar animation lag
tickets.description: Sidebar transitions are sluggish on Chrome.

tickets.title: Pagination not working
tickets.description: Tickets list doesn’t change when navigating pages.

tickets.title: User session timeout too short
tickets.description: Users are logged out too quickly due to session timeout.

tickets.title: Ticket sorting incorrect
tickets.description: Sorting by date doesn’t arrange tickets properly.

tickets.title: Profile bio not saving
tickets.description: Edits to bio are not persisting after reload.

tickets.title: Attachment upload fails
tickets.description: Unable to attach files larger than 2MB.

tickets.title: Filter not resetting
tickets.description: Applied filters remain active even after reset.
